subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Armanti Edwards threw for 367 yards and 5 touchdowns and ran for another score in Appalachian State’s 70-24 rout of visiting Wofford in the Football Championship Subdivision.
snippet: Armanti Edwards threw for 367 yards and 5 touchdowns and ran for another score in Appalachian State’s 70-24 rout of visiting Wofford in the Football Championship Subdivision.
